```{r fig.width=10, fig.height=9, out.width="100%", out.height="100%"}
network_data <- create_networkplot_data(
  subpage_df,
  geneList,
  pathway_categories = networkplot_categories
)

gene_node_type <- network_data$nodes %>%
  dplyr::filter(group != "process") %>%
  dplyr::select(group) %>%
  pull() %>%
  as.numeric()

forceNetwork(
  Links = network_data$edges,
  Nodes = network_data$nodes,
  colourScale = JS(
    generate_js_color_string(
      gene_node_type,
      palette = gene_palette,
      no_colors = no_colors,
      rev = TRUE
    )
  ),
  Source = "from_num",
  Target = "to_num",
  NodeID = "name",
  Group = "group",
  fontFamily = "Helvetica",
  fontSize = 12,
  opacity = 1,
  linkDistance = 125,
  linkColour = "#808080",
  charge = -125,
  opacityNoHover = 1,
  zoom = TRUE
)
```
